snippet.title: CoH: Modern Combat - Trailer 6
snippet.description:
CoH: MC Trailer 6. The footage was filmed on one of our WIP maps, so watch out for new environmental stuff, like cars, new buildings, etc.
Our other particularly noteworthy features are the new US Headquarters tent, new heavy machine gun teams, TOW emplacements, Chinese Infantry models, a skin update for the Type 82 Mult Rocket Launcher System and finally... an AH-64 Apache that wrecks havoc in the final scene!
